LanguageData.AC_StartInsertionDesc: Bring produce to the artisan fermenter to start processing
LanguageData.AC_CancelBringingProduceDesc: Cancel bringing produce to the artisan fermenter.
LanguageData.AC_VinegarFailurePower: The product has spoiled due to a power failure in the artisan fermenter
LanguageData.AC_CaskNotWorking: This artisan fermenter is not working at the moment
LanguageData.AC_InfuserNotWorking: This infuser is not working at the moment
LanguageData.AC_CantRunQuest: Quest can't be run at the moment (likely culprit: no allies in the world to offer it)
LanguageData.AC_DisableQuests_Description: Disables Artisan Trading quests from triggering. Bear in mind these quests are independent of any other quests or storyteller events (raids, manhunters, etc). They don't "take a slot"
LanguageData.AC_QuestRate: Artisan Trading quest multiplier (lower means getting the event more often)
LanguageData.AC_QuestRateTooltip: The frequency of the Artisan Trading quest being offered is multiplied by this number (with a multiplier of 1, it is offered every between 15 and 30 days at random). Numbers below 1 decrease the time, while numbers above it increase it. Note that this event doesn't "replace" normal quests, it works independently.
LanguageData.AC_MarketValueModifierTooltip: The market value of artisan goods will be multiplied by this rate. 0.1 means artisan goods will be basically worthless, while 5 will quintuple their value, and therefore the profit. Make millionaires out of fermented fish, I don't care!
LanguageData.AC_StatsReport_ArtisanProduct: Artisan product mod options modifier x{0}
LanguageData.AC_UseDropdownForMachines: Use dropdown designator for machines (requires game reload)
LanguageData.AC_UseDropdownForMachines_Description: If this is ON, all buildings added by this mod will appear under a single designator for the artisan workshop, and clicking on it will bring up a dropdown menu to select the rest. OFF by default as it confused people. Requires game reload.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsTitle: Acting as condiment (if VE Cooking is present)
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsButter: A rich, creamy dairy product made by churning cream, commonly used in cooking, baking, and as a spread. It gives a 10% bonus to Blood pumping for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsSourCream: A tangy, creamy dairy product made by curdling milk with vinegar, offering a rich texture and flavor perfect for enhancing both savory and sweet dishes. Provides +5% Immunity Gain Speed for 12 hours for a probiotic benefit but slightly decreases Move Speed due to its richness.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsButtermilk: A tangy, slightly thickened dairy product made by combining milk with lemon juice, commonly used in baking and cooking to add moisture and a subtle acidity to recipes. Provides +12% Injury Healing Factor; however, slightly reduces Social Impact for its acquired taste.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsCondensedMilk: A thick, sweetened dairy product made by reducing milk, commonly used in desserts, baking, or as a long-lasting ingredient for various recipes. Provides +15% Psychic Sensitivity for a mood-lifting sweetness, but also +5% Rest Fall Rate as it makes the consumer feel sluggish.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsVinegar: A sharp, acidic liquid created by fermenting produce, used for cooking, preserving food, and crafting artisan goods. Boosts toxin resistance by 10% for 12 hours, aligning with its cleansing qualities.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsFishSauce: A savory, fermented liquid made from fish, commonly used as a flavorful condiment. +8% Manipulation for 12 hours, enhances dexterity for cooking and crafting, but lowers Social impact due to its strong smell.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsMiso: A traditional paste made by fermenting soybeans with koji, known for its rich, savory flavor. Provides +5% Psychic Sensitivity and +5% Blood Filtration for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsBlackGarlic: Black garlic is a type of aged garlic that undergoes a fermentation-like process, resulting in soft, dark-colored cloves. Provides very mild regeneration of wounds for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsFlour: A finely ground powder made from non-wheat sources such as nuts, seeds, or alternative grains. Increases mood by 3 for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsZest: The outer peel of citrus fruits, rich in aromatic oils and vibrant flavors. Provides a bright flavor boosting joy, lowering Joy fall rate factor for 10% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsCornSyrup: A sweetener made from corn starch, processed to convert some of its glucose into fructose. Provides a large +20% Moving bonus, but also lowers Manipulation by 5% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsMolasses: A thick, dark syrup created as a byproduct of the sugar refining process, especially from sugarcane. Provides a 5% bonus to Global learning factor and a 5% Rest fall rate factor reduction for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsEssence: A concentrated extract derived from the purest flavors or aromas of ingredients like fruits, herbs, or spices. Makes you refreshed and ready to harvest some kidneys or something, giving a 5% bonus to Medical tend speed and Medical operation speed for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsJam: A sweet spread made by cooking fruits with sugar, jam preserves the flavors of ripe fruit while creating a thick, spreadable consistency. Makes you forget your problems for a while, reducing the duration of negative memories by 20% for 2 days.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsGhee: A clarified butter with a rich, nutty flavor, prized for its high smoke point and long shelf life. It gives a 12% bonus to Blood pumping and a 2.5% bonus to immunity gain speed for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsGravy: A rich, savory sauce made by combining meat drippings with flavorful stock, thickened for a smooth texture and bold flavor. Increases animal gather speed and yield for 10% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsOil: A versatile, high-quality liquid used for cooking, crafting, and various artisan processes. Increases toxic environment resistance for 10% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.AC_CondimentEffectsInfusedOil: Infused oil is crafted by steeping rich oil with herbal medicine or aromatic spices inside an infuser. Increases toxic environment resistance for 20% for 12 hours.
